preconditions.precondition: The Receptionist requests to view the dashboard.

mainSequence.step: Receptionist requests to view the dashboard.
UI receives the request to view the dashboard.
Router processes the GET request for /dashboard.
DashboardModel fetches dashboard data from the Database.
Dashboard data is queried from the Database.
Dashboard data is sent back to the Repository.
Dashboard data is returned to the Controller.
Controller responds with 200 OK status containing dashboard data.
Router sends 200 OK response with dashboard data to UI.
UI displays the dashboard data to the Receptionist.
